projects.title: Sales Dashboard in Power BI
projects.description: An interactive Power BI dashboard showcasing sales trends, customer segmentation, and revenue insights.
projects.detailedDescription: This project involved creating a comprehensive sales dashboard using Power BI, including data visualization, filtering, and drill-down capabilities.

projects.title: Excel Data Analysis Report
projects.description: A detailed Excel report analyzing company performance using pivot tables, charts, and formulas.
projects.detailedDescription: This project involved creating a detailed Excel report to analyze company performance, including data analysis, visualization, and recommendations for improvement.

projects.title: Python Jupyter Notebook - Customer Churn
projects.description: A predictive model built in Jupyter Notebook to analyze customer churn using machine learning.
projects.detailedDescription: This project involved building a predictive model using Jupyter Notebook and machine learning algorithms to analyze customer churn and identify factors that contribute to it.

projects.title: Kaggle Dataset Analysis
projects.description: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) and visualization of a popular Kaggle dataset using Pandas and Seaborn.
projects.detailedDescription: This project involved performing exploratory data analysis and visualization of a popular Kaggle dataset using Pandas and Seaborn, including data cleaning, feature engineering, and model selection.
